description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) to planning permission 161554RMS dated 17.06.2016 for "Reserved matters application for Plot 1, Building 1 and Plot 3 Buildings 4 and 5 of outline planning application ref: PP/2012/5040 detailing access, appearance, landscaping, layout and scale in relation to the construction of one mixed use block (Building 1) of 7 storey's containing (23no.1 bedroom units and 17no. 2 bedroom units and 645sq.m of B1/D1 use) and two apartment blocks (Buildings 4 and 5) part 3 storey and part 6 storeys containing (31no. 1 bedroom unit, 54 no. 2 bedroom units, 11 no. 3 bed units, 6no. 4 bedroom units and 67sq.m of A1/A3/B1) associated private and semi-private amenity space, refuse/recycling and bicycle stores, 51 under croft car parking spaces and 20 on street parking spaces, provision of 271sq.m of play space for 0-4 years olds and 155sq.m of play space for 5-11 years olds: application made part pursuant to condition 3 (Reserved Matters) of outline planning permission LBE ref: PP/2012/5040 dated 22/07/2013 (amended by application PP/2014/5010 dated 23 10/2013, PP/2014/4645 dated 08/12/2014 and P/2015/3928)" Amendment seeks external changes to the existing ground floor fa√ßade involving changes to the existing glazing and panelling configuration to provide new louvred panelling and new door openings.
site_name: St Bernards Hospital Uxbridge RoadSouthallUB1 3HW
